gp-global-section-542125718687974646.gglolsESGxp_childItem_2_html: How to Use the Helloskin V3 Handset
gp-global-section-542125718687974646.ggVSscVg5T2_text_html:
Trusted by Over 25,000 Customers

With a proven track record of delivering exceptional products, our business has earned the trust of over 25,000 satisfied customers.
gp-global-section-542125718687974646.ggJG-rU9Q0L_text_html:
30 Day Returns & They're Free

We stand behind the quality of our products, which is why we offer a hassle-free 30-day return policy! & They are completely free.
gp-global-section-542125718687974646.gg6Enf8_L9a_text_html:
Fast & Free Shipping Over $60 (Shipped from Australia)

All orders placed before 2PM are picked and packed from our Australian warehouse. Orders over $60 are free of charge. $5 Shipping for orders under $60.
gp-global-section-542125718687974646.ggIiL1YcWOX_text_html:
Eco-Friendly

We are committed to sustainability and reducing our environmental impact. That's why where we can, we strive to offer eco-friendly products that are responsibly sourced, made with sustainable materials, and designed to minimise waste.
gp-global-section-542125718687974646.ggcD5NncSX4_text_html:
Free Returns

We want you to be completely satisfied with your purchase, which is why we offer hassle-free returns for added convenience. Your satisfaction is our top priority.
gp-global-section-542125718687974646.ggIyBpL6gdJ_text_html:
Ice Mode:

 Instantly cools the skin, tightening pores, reducing puffiness, and soothing irritation. Ideal for calming skin after sun exposure or when your skin needs a refreshing boost
gp-global-section-542125718687974646.ggR9PVz3S6d_text_html:
Blue Light Mode:

Effectively targets acne-causing bacteria, helping to reduce breakouts, inflammation, and acne scars. Use with any handset setting to calm irritated skin, prevent future breakouts, and maintain a clearer complexion
gp-global-section-542125718687974646.gg4Hy2gDEjF_text_html:
Red Light Mode: 

Stimulates collagen production to visibly reduce fine lines and wrinkles, resulting in firmer, more youthful skin. Whether you're using the EMS, Pulse, or Warm Mode, Red Light enhances skin elasticity and smoothness for lasting anti-aging results
gp-global-section-542125718687974646.ggvR0vG9TMF_text_html:
Green Light Mode: 

Helps brighten skin, reduce hyperpigmentation, and even out skin tone by inhibiting melanin production. Paired with any setting, Green Light enhances skin brightness, leaving you with a radiant, glowing complexion.
gp-global-section-542125718687974646.ggmXxFjDC4T_text_html:
EMS Mode: 

Electrical Muscle Stimulation uses gentle micro-currents to stimulate and tone facial muscles. This mode helps lift and firm sagging skin, enhances facial contours, and promotes a more youthful, lifted appearance.
gp-global-section-542125718687974646.ggE17i7vQD2_text_html:
Pulse Mode:

Delivers intermittent pulses to mimic a professional massage, penetrating deeply into the skin. This mode enhances product absorption, reduces tension, and revitalises skin, leaving it looking vibrant and refreshed.
gp-global-section-542125718687974646.gg025CUqY9l_text_html:
Clean Mode:

Utilises high-frequency vibrations to dislodge oil, dirt, and impurities from deep within the pores. Perfect for use with your favorite cleansing product or the included cleansing pads, this mode ensures a thorough, deep cleanse for smoother, clearer skin.

gp-global-section-543758682484114498.ggGFbDkEjPl_text_html: Suffered from severe hormonal acne, 8 weeks before and after, using helloskin cleanser, handset, anti acne serum and moisturiser
gp-global-section-543758682484114498.ggogriMc82b_text_html: Lisa suffered from severe acne around her cheeks and especially her chin. With the help of the Anti acne kit and handset she reduced her acne by 95%
gp-global-section-543758682484114498.ggXkfS5bngE_text_html: Constant breakouts over the last 5 years, currently sticks to the day/night routine of handset, cleanser, anti acne and moisturiser.
gp-global-section-543758682484114498.ggILAH-Ajbb_text_html: Yana had aging signs on her forehead and around her eyes. With Just the handset and Retinol she was able to reduce her fine lines significantly
gp-global-section-543758682484114498.ggWY8sdJmKr_text_html: Anna also suffers from hormonal acne and has never been able to control it. Using the handset twice daily she has been able to practically eliminate her acne.
gp-global-section-543758682484114498.ggIbLbGqLxj_text_html: Emma suffers from acne and has some scarring that she has been able to reduce significantly with the help of the handset

gp-global-section-544202537608152059.ggE0S7F8N0P_text_html: High-performance skincare that works or your money back!
gp-global-section-544202537608152059.ggAcpni1zqc_text_html: Experience real results with skincare that’s been rigorously tried and tested. We’re so confident in our products that if you don’t achieve the results you’re after, we’ll give you your money back!
gp-global-section-544202537608152059.ggXexwcjEOy_text_html: THE SKINCARE OF THE FUTURE HAS ARRIVED.
